chunks.content: Concept Deck NEXAVA for Market Research - Malang Doc Gym Certified or semi-pro running trainers who manage 1‚Äì10 trainees Description Target Segment Key Features & Business Model ‚óè Trainers Registration ‚óè Trainers Dashboard ‚óè Prerequisite trainee goals form ‚óè AI assisted menu builder üíª Platform: App üí∞ Monetization: Trainer subscription + booking fees A platform to connect running trainers with trainees, including AI-assisted features for goal tracking, meal plan builder, and progress reports. ‚óè Understand how trainers currently find runners ‚óè Validate demand for goal-based training plans and progress tracking. ‚óè Evaluate the form for menu builder & exercise plan ‚óè Assess usability and expectations from trainer-trainee communication tools. ‚óè Explore pricing expectations for trainers (subscription) & pricing Problem to Solve ‚óè Trainers struggle to efficiently find, manage, and track trainees using fragmented tools. ‚óè Progress tracking and plan customization are time-consuming for trainers. Research Objective Prepaid Kids Apps Digital-savvy parents with school-age children (6‚Äì13 y.o.) Description Target Segment Research Objective Key Features & Business Model ‚óè Location tracking ‚óè Vaccine schedule reminders ‚óè School info hub üíª Platform: Apps (ProtekSi Kecil) üí∞ Monetization: Bundling with data package & subscription ProtekSi Kecil enhancement; A parental assistant to track children‚Äôs location, and support health & school needs. ‚óè Understand parental needs in tracking, protecting, and supporting their children digitally. ‚óè Evaluate demand for features like vaccine reminders, location tracking, and internet filtering. ‚óè Explore reactions to subscription vs. bundling model and pricing ‚óè Validate the perceived value of a centralized parenting utility app. Problem to Solve ‚óè Parents need a single app to track location and support kids‚Äô health and school needs. ‚óè Existing solutions are fragmented and time-consuming to manage Prepaid AI Assistant for Gaming ‚óè Gamers who enjoy adventure/single-player games ‚óè Gamers who often search for walkthroughs, guides, or YouTube help Description Target Segment Key Features & Business Model ‚óè In-game pop-up guide ‚óè Image-based support (Upload Image) üíª Platform: App üí∞ Monetization: Token-based (pay-per-use) A real-time AI assistant that helps gamers overcome challenges by providing contextual in-game tips. Works via overlay or screenshot analysis. ‚óè Understand gamers‚Äô current pain points when stuck in single-player or adventure games. ‚óè Explore acceptance and relevance of real-time AI-based guidance ‚óè Evaluate willingness to use overlay or screenshot-based game helpers. ‚óè Test monetization acceptance through token-based access & Pricing Problem to Solve ‚óè Gamers lack real-time, in-game help and must interrupt play to search for guide ‚óè No seamless solution exists for contextual, in-game guidance. Research Objective Postpaid New Calling ‚óè Mobile users seeking richer, more interactive, and intelligent calling experiences ‚óè People who often speak with others in different languages over the phone Description Target Segment Research Objective Key Features ‚óè Visualized Voice Calling ‚óè Real-Time AI-Based Translation ‚óè Fun Calling with Avatars üíª Platform: Smartphone celular call üí∞ Monetization: Value added to Premium Package New calling is a value-added 5G Calling services that can Visualized Voice Calling, showing Avatars, and Real-Time AI-based Translation ‚óè Understand user behaviors and habits related to voice/video calling in daily life. ‚óè Gauge awareness and first impressions of the New Calling concept. ‚óè Identify adoption triggers and potential barriers to usage. ‚óè Test user acceptance of the business model, New Calling is only available for premium data packages Problem to Solve ‚óè Traditional voice and video calls have become boring ‚óè Current calling experiences feel impersonal and outdated and lack of personalisation Postpaid Kuota Patungan 1. Colleagues Students 2. Community gamers Description Target Segment Research Objective Key Features & Business Model ‚óè Create group & choose package ‚óè Split bill ‚óè Auto quota allocation üíª Platform: App üí∞ Monetization: Direct package purchase A group data package where users split the cost and get allocated quota based on their contribution. ‚óè Explore current group behaviors around shared quota purchases. ‚óè Validate interest in split-bill purchasing and dynamic quota allocation. ‚óè Evaluate understanding of how quota is distributed fairly. ‚óè Compare to existing alternatives like Kuota sharing or individual packages. Problem to Solve ‚óè Groups find it hard to share data packages and split costs or quotas fairly. ‚óè Current solutions are inflexible and require manual management. Postpaid PuterAja Description Research Objective Key Features & Business Model

metadata.source: NEXAVA Concept Deck for Market Research.pdf

chunks.content: ‚óè Reward preview ‚óè Gacha spin ‚óè Rewards shipment tracking üíª Platform: Mini-App üí∞ Monetization: Bundling with data package & point burning A gacha-style mini-app to win exclusive merchandise. Users earn spins through Telkomsel bundles or Telkomsel point redemption. ‚óè Explore appeal of spinning/gacha-style reward mechanics among fandom/collector communities. ‚óè Understand the types of exclusive merchandise that are highly desirable. ‚óè Assess willingness to purchase Telkomsel packages or redeem points for spins. ‚óè Test understanding and appeal of bundling mechanics (data + gacha token) 1. Item Collectors 2. Fandom communities Target Segment Problem to Solve ‚óè Fans want engaging, gamified ways to win exclusive merchandise. ‚óè Current Telkomsel reward programs lack excitement and repeat engagement. Youth Anti Scam SMS Professionals or older adults who are concerned about scams Description Target Segment Research Objective Key Features & Business Model ‚óè SMS labeling: Secure / Scam / On Review ‚óè Clean inbox separation üíª Platform: Apps üí∞ Monetization: Subscription or bundling A secure SMS app that flags potential scams and separates suspicious messages from normal ones ‚óè Explore how users currently detect or deal with suspicious SMS messages. ‚óè Evaluate trust and usefulness of AI-powered SMS scam detection. ‚óè Test user preference for inbox separation and message labeling. ‚óè Explore willingness to pay or accept this as a bundled Telkomsel add-on. Problem to Solve ‚óè Users have difficulty identifying and managing scam SMS, risking their security. ‚óè There‚Äôs no easy way to filter and flag suspicious messages in one app. Youth Wunderkammer Description Research Objective Key Features & Business Model ‚óè AI content generator (based on user prompt) ‚óè Instant preview & direct posting to multiple social media platforms ‚óè Basic analytics for engagement tracking üíª Platform: Web platform üí∞ Monetization: Freemium (first free, next paid) AI-powered content creation that enables users to generate social media posts using AI prompts and directly publish them to their preferred platforms. ‚óè Understand key pain points creators face in generating consistent content ‚óè Explore appeal of AI-generated templates and captioning tools ‚óè Validate freemium model (e.g., 1 free post, then paid) and ideal pricing ‚óè Identify which social platforms users want to connect with (e.g., IG, TikTok, Twitter) ‚óè Tech-savvy content creators ‚óè Use AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Canva) or follow AI content trends Target Segment Problem to Solve ‚óè Content creators often face creative blocks ‚óè Many tools are either too complex or time-consuming for solo creators ‚óè There's a growing need for AI-powered content assistance for daily posts Youth Mental Health AI Stressed individuals but are unsure if they need professional support or not People who opens to digital mental health support Description Target Segment Research Objective Key Features ‚óè Onboarding Users ‚óè Interaction with AI screening + Recommendation ‚óè Interaction with OWDI & Psychologist in Naluri üíª Platform: Web Platform üí∞ Monetization: Telkomsel Bundling Mental Health AI is an AI-powered mental wellness screening tool designed to help users assess their emotional state and determine the right type of support. ‚óè Understand real-life triggers or contexts where users feel the need for emotional support ‚óè Explore user receptiveness to AI as a first step in mental health screening ‚óè Assess perceived value of OWDI vs. psychologist support in Naluri ‚óè Test how users interpret and trust the AI recommendations Problem to Solve ‚óè Many individuals feel stressed but are unsure whether they need professional help or not ‚óè Lack of guidance on where to seek the most suitable support ‚óè Difficulty accessing the psychologist Youth Cloud Gaming Cross-Platform Gamers Gamers with Limited Storage Lapsed Console Gamers Description Target Segment Research Objective Key Features & Business Model ‚óè Game dashboard ‚óè Play the game ‚óè Cross-device view üíª Platform: Cloud gaming platform üí∞ Monetization: Subscription & Pay-per-game Play premium games directly on any device via streaming. No downloads or hardware required ‚Äî just internet. ‚óè Understand constraints faced by gamers with limited storage ‚óè Evaluate appeal of cloud-based, no-install gaming experiences. ‚óè Test preferences between subscription and pay-per-play models. ‚óè Explore expectations on game quality, latency, and variety of titles. Problem to Solve ‚óè Gamers with limited storage or old devices can‚Äôt easily access premium games without downloads. ‚óè No convenient, cross-device solution exists

metadata.source: NEXAVA Concept Deck for Market Research.pdf

chunks.content: for instant gaming experience Convergence Housewives Apps Stay-at-home moms managing household duties Digital-savvy women in suburban/urban areas Description Target Segment Research Objective Key Features ‚óè Daily cooking guides and meal planning ‚óè To-do list & task reminders (e.g. bayar listrik) ‚óè Content hub: budgeting, health tips, etc üíª Platform: Mobile App üí∞ Monetization: Bundling with data A multifunctional app designed to support housewives in managing their daily routines. It offers guidance for cooking, reminders for household tasks, and content like family budgeting. ‚óè Explore household routines and digital habits of stay-at-home mothers ‚óè Understand pain points in daily task management, cooking, and parenting ‚óè Test appeal of a centralized ‚Äúhousehold assistant‚Äù app ‚óè Assess willingness to use such app daily and pay via bundling ‚óè Evaluate feature prioritization: what‚Äôs useful, what‚Äôs not Problem to Solve ‚óè Housewives often juggle many responsibilities but lack tools designed specifically for their routines ‚óè Most task management or lifestyle apps are not optimized for homemakers ‚óè Lack of centralized, culturally relevant content for everyday family needs Convergence PetApps Tech-Savvy Pet owners Frequent Online Shoppers for Pet Needs Description Target Segment Research Objective Key Features ‚óè Purchase Tools Tracker ‚óè Track Pet location via GPS ‚óè Purchase Pet food and medicine ‚óè Tele-medicine for Pet Doctor üíª Platform: Mobile App üí∞ Monetization: data bundling, device sales, marketplace commission MyPet is a companion app for pet owners that helps them care for their pets more easily and proactively. ‚óè Understand pet owners' current behaviors and tools used for pet care (e.g., tracking, health, shopping). ‚óè Identify pain points and unmet needs in managing pet health, safety, and daily care. ‚óè Explore user interest and relevance of key features ‚óè Assess willingness to use and pay for digital pet care solutions. Problem to Solve ‚óè Lack of centralized tools for pet care ‚óè Difficulty monitoring pet health and safety Convergence

metadata.source: NEXAVA Concept Deck for Market Research.pdf

Field research report Malang, 28 - 31 July 2025 Version 2.0 NEXAVA x UX DIGITAL PRODIGY TEAM Cloud Games Cloud Games Experience a New Era of Gaming with the Cloud. Instantly access premium games anytime, anywhere‚Äîno downloads, no installations. Just connect to the internet and play directly from your device, without the need for expensive gaming hardware 65% 35% Respondents‚Äô Occupation: Reflecting a young and active working demographic (Students-30 and Private Employees-29) A majority of 55 respondents earn below IDR 2.5 million, indicating a low-income population base Most respondents spend under IDR 100K on telco‚Äî already 4% or more of their monthly income, highlighting a cost-sensitive market Sample Size 89 of 400 Respondent who relatable with used cased Willingness to Pay Rp15.000 (Median) Cloud Games They‚Äôve bought the games, watched the streams‚Äîbut can‚Äôt enjoy them fully because their devices can‚Äôt keep up. Behaviour's as GamerH LC Playing both solo or multiplayer games (e.g., Genshin, GTA, Dota2, CS Go)C [C Spend an average of 3‚Äì4 hours daily gamingC 1C Play 3 days a week or more, often every dayC ,C smartphones, console and laptops/PCs. )C 0C Like to watch game streamers to learn Multiplatform gamers: (Steam and Epic Games¬É Use medium-to-low-end devices to play gameH Pain Point as GamerH √ë√ê Limited hardware performance restricts their gaming experienc¬¨ to play on √á Frequent or blue-screen crashes during gameplayC Device due to extended gaming sessionsC space for large game filesC ¬Ü√ê Wait times for games to be released on Steam or similar platforms.  √ê Forced low graphics settings  √ê overheating " √ê battery degrades quickly & √ê Limited storage ‚ÄúSaya main game bisa hampir setiap hari, sekali main bisa sampe 3 - 4 jam‚Äù - Luthfi, 22Yo, College Student U dah beli game GTA 5 , eh pas dimainin ternyata ga kuat laptopnya, ngelag banget. F ay, 2 1Y o, College Student Cloud Games Its a solution, IF it delivers flawless cloud performance and wide-ranging games library User Perception and ExpectatioL @G Allows access to premium/console-level games without buying the device= 'G Lowering device specification requirements and Reduces need for big downloads and memory usag5 EG Instant access without needing to download the games Users‚Äô feedback on Feature / Capabilit¬É @G , as users believe it offers prioritized network performance for gaming sessionsG 'G ‚Äî some prefer one-time purchases for a game, while others lean toward a monthly subscription mode¬ë EG Availability on to usersG YG The ]G Game voucher redemption is highly dependent on pricing Dedicated gaming quota is highly appealing Duration-based access is not attractive to many users Tencent games only is very unappealing leaderboard feature fails to leave any impressioL Proble m-S olution Fi t C loud gaming solves user problem for gamers stuck with low-end devices‚Äîit removes hardware limits, and offers instant access to cross platform games . H owever, we need to ensure t h e capabilit y of t h e net w ork & cloud perfor m ance since any lag or stutter kills the e x perience . M oreover, the g a m e catalo g m ust g o be y ond T encent librar y since some users e x pect access to high-end, console-level games . Dapur Pintar Dapur Pintar A Digital Assistant for Homemakers. Simplify daily household tasks‚Äîfrom schedules and recipes to reminders‚Äîall in one app. Designed specifically for homemakers, this smartphone application helps manage everyday activities with ease, convenience, and efficiency 1% 99% Respondents‚Äô Occupation: Indicates a highly specific segment‚Äîmature women in their productive years. pointing to a mix of domestic users and working professionals Majority earn between IDR 2.5M‚Äì5M. The income range shows a moderately budget-conscious user group, especially relevant for service pricing. Spending aligns with a cost-aware profile, reinforcing the need for affordable digital bundles or add-ons Sample Size 35 of 400 Respondent who relatable with used cased Willingness to Pay Rp10.000 (Median) They‚Äôre not just cooking, they‚Äôre constantly thinking, deciding, searching, and worrying, all on their own. to avoid waste Decide the menu first search for meal inspiration online Rarely using leftover ingredients Pain Point in Meal Preparation & Cookin¬ê B3 Already have a menu in mind but i/ =3 or unavailable locall¬Å 3 Worried husband/kids on what to cook nex/ 3 End up struggle to cook Ingredients are hard to find get bored with repetitive menus / Frequently run out of inspiration buying too many ingredients and not using them all ‚Äúkalo lagi bingung cari inspirasi masakan biasanya di Youtube atau Cookpad‚Äù -Anindita 39 Yo, Housewives ‚ÄúPas mau masak gule atau lodeh ga bisa karena ternyata susah bumbunya‚Äù - Dwi 34 Yo, Housewives Dapur Pintar The biggest problem is not "What to do with these ingredients?", it's "What should I cook tomorrow?" A real-time AI assistant that provides contextual tips when you're stuck in single-player games. Get on-screen guidance or support through screenshot analysis‚Äîhelping you overcome challenges without leaving the game 78% 22% Representation of digital-native young adults, likely familiar with online and mobile gaming trends. Highlighting two key user segments: working professionals and learners, This indicates that over 75% belong to the low to lower- middle income bracket A cost-sensitive audience, despite being digitally engaged‚Äîemphasizing the need for affordable, bundled offerings to drive adoption Sample Size 114 of 400 Respondent who relatable with used cased Willingness to Pay Rp20.000 (Median) They love figuring things out on their own, but when they‚Äôre stuck, most tips are vague, unreliable, or just a waste of time Behaviour's as Single-Player Gamer> B: Mostly play story-rich or adventure games (e.g., Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3, Sekiro) and highly engaged by story narrative and character- buildinZ : and avoid asking for help unless absolutely stuc : Rely on or walkthrough* : Sometimes restart the game after poor decisions or getting stuck for too long Prefer solving problems independently YouTube, Google, Reddit, TikTok, or Discord for hints Pain Point to Overcome ‚Äústuck‚Äù in game> B: Tips from forums/Discord : on what to do next in : Restarting feels like a waste of hours and effor¬É : Overpowered bosses require excessive grinding sometimes doesn‚Äôt work or hard to follo√Ñ Confused unclear mission> ‚ÄúSaya senang game yang storynya bagus dan kita bisa bangun endingnya sendiri‚Äù Fayadh, 21Yo, College Student ‚ÄúKadang udah ngikutin tips dari discord tapi kok hasilnya beda‚Äù Thareeq, 21 Yo, College Student Hint Hero Getting stuck is part of the thrill. Gamers only seek help when they‚Äôre desperate, and even then, free forums like YouTube or Reddit are easily accessible User Perception and Expectatio8 41 May offer more reliable and contextual hints compared to Discord or Reddit1 !1 Offer fast solution and reduce time wasting in browsing the hint Users‚Äô feedback on Feature / Capabilitr 41 !1 Users find the and effectively

resolve their problems1 S1 Image upload or photo input doesn‚Äôt add much value compared to simply typing and searching1 N1 In-game integration could be a game-changer, but only if it works seamlessly and in real time. Speed in delivering helpful hints is a big plu¬ö AI concept exciting and promising, as long as it‚Äôs smart enough to understand the context Problem-Solution Fit The probability of use case is very niche since by nature gamers enjoy the challenge of figuring things out on their own, getting stuck is part of the game. AI hints might kill the satisfaction of beating the game fair and square, especially for story-driven games. Hint Hero‚Äôs usefulness would be limited to very specific frustration points and even then, it must outperform these free alternatives (e.g Discord, Youtube) in both speed and relevance. Hint Hero Kids App Willingness to Pay Rp12.500 (Median) Kids App For Parents! This app helps you keep your child safe and balanced in the digital world. Features include child location tracking, vaccination reminders, school updates, and internet access controls. 57% 43% Indicates a more mature, working-age audience with potential purchasing power and routine digital habits. Employment and flexible-income professions, relevant for targeting practical Showing a relatively balanced, but price-aware profile. This points to a strong demand for affordable telco services Sample Size 115 of 400 Respondent who relatable with used cased Parents are not looking for just control. they‚Äôre hesitant to give kids phones at all, fearing it will open the door to inappropriate content Behaviour's in Managing KidJ NE Monitor kids‚Äô phone usage manually ‚Äî e.g., by asking them to ‚Äúreturn the phone after X minutes‚Äù or physically checking the deviceE %E like Google Family Link and provided native by phone carrier (Samsung/Apple E (they only allow usage on weekends E When choosing schools, proximity to home is often is the most important (Zoning Terms, at least in Malang *E They usually hear about good schools from word-of-mouth Use basic free tools Reluctant to give their kids smartphones Pain Point in Managing KidJ NE , but kids often keep pushing back or complainingE %E There‚Äôs growing especially from platforms like TikTok and YouTube ShortsE E , especially when they go out to play‚Äîraising concerns about lack of supervision or even kids lying about their whereabouts. Parents want to limit screen time concern about non- educational content and trend-driven exposure, Sometimes, parents don‚Äôt know where their kids are ‚ÄúKita membolehkan akses internet sesuai dengan waktunya, misalkan weekend‚Äù Rannga 37Yo, Enterpreneur ‚ÄúAnak suka tantrum kalo waktu aksesnya habis‚Äù Dwi 34 Yo Housewives Kids App Many parents are still hesitant to give their kids smartphones making most app- based solutions irrelevant from the start. User Perception and Expectatio: 0- Control child‚Äôs internet access to help manage screen time and online content- !- Track child‚Äôs real-time location for better safety and peace of mind- - Easily access school-related information, including tuition fees and updates. Users‚Äô feedback on Feature / Capabilitr 0- especially when children go out alone- !- , as it‚Äôs already handled by native features on most devices- - (in Malang, school choice is based on zoning, and parents usually rely on word-of-mouth and location- J- , since parents typically follow doctor recommendations and can easily access schedules through local clinics Location tracking is considered useful, Internet blocking offers less added value School info and directories aren‚Äôt essential Vaccine info is seen as unnecessary Problem-Solution Fit Internet filtering isn‚Äôt a real gap, as native phone features already offer plenty of solutions. The real issue is not about access, but the inability to filter harmful or irrelevant content. While location tracking addresses a real pain point, many parents are actually reluctant to give their kids a phone in the first place School info and directories are not relevant (zoning rules and parents rely more on word-of-mouth) Kids App Kuota Patungan indicating a mostly budget-conscious segment 56% 44% Kuota Patungan A group data package where users split the cost and receive a data allocation based on their contribution. Approximately 12% of survey participants in Malang indicated that they found the Kuota Patungan use cases to be relatable Sample Size 48 of 400 Respondent who relatable with used

cased This points to a moderate willingness to spend, suggesting that affordable but value-driven offerings are key for adoption. Summary The Weighted Scoring Model (WSM) is a decision-making tool to prioritize portfolios. It assigns weights to key criteria: 40% Problem‚ÄìSolution Fit, 40% Market Size, 20%

Resistance to Substitution. The scores are multiplied by their respective weights, and then summed to produce a prioritization score. This framework helps evaluate how well a product or solution addresses a real and significant market problem. The score ranges from 1 (no relevant problem) to 5 (critical problem with highly suitable solution) Problem-Solution Fit (40%) Relatable Used cased (40%) Resistance to Substitution (20%) Relatable Use Case represents the percentage of respondents from the Malang survey (n=400) who can imagine themselves fits into their daily routines, habits, or problem- solving needs. Scores range from 0 to 5, determined by the percentage of respondents in the preliminary survey. R esistant measures the potential market to a d opt the pro d uct , base d on how many equivalent alternatives exist and how easily users can access them. The resistance score is determined by the availability of substitutes in the market and the product ‚Äô s unique value proposition . Product Scoring Criteria: Weighted Scoring Model (WSM) ‚Äì Product Portfolio Management Result Weighted Scoring Model This framework follows Stage-Gate¬Æ New Product Development (NPDW <) Quantify each concept in strategic criteria (Problem‚ÄìSolution Fit, Relatable Use Case, and Defensibility)) $) Weight criteria based WSM product phase; Pilot/incubation (40% Fit, 40% Use Case, 20% Defensibility)) ) Score and rank products, applying the Stage-Gate threshol5 O) Go = ‚â• 3.50 (‚â• 70% of max score 5) ‚Äì Proceed to prototyping/pilot with high confidence) Q) Improve = 2.50 ‚Äì 3.49 ‚Äì Requires refinement before major investment) 2) Rethink = < 2.50 ‚Äì Not viable in current form; need a major concept revision Key takeawaysi ¬∫¬ù Go (‚â• 3.50) ‚Äì Proceed to Prototyping/Pilo¬é ‚Äì Strong market fit, and good defensibility. But need to ensure automatio¬≤ y¬ù Improve (2.50 ‚Äì 3.49) ‚Äì Refine before G√à - Expand market size through positioning, improve reliability of core technology, and strengthen UVP√ä ¬Ä¬ù Rethink/No-Go (< 2.50) ‚Äì Concept Revisio¬≤ [ All other products in this range need to reassess core value proposition to address market fit gaps, or pivot entirely before considering further investment. √õ Anti Scam SMS (4.4) √õ Kids App (3.2), MyPet (3.0), Cloud Gaming (3.0), Doc Gym (2.8) *details for each score rationale can refer to appendix P roduct P ro b le m- Solution F it (40%) Rel a t ab le U se Ca sed (40%) Resist a nce to Su b stitution (20%) T ot a l Score Re ma r k s A nti Sc am SMS 1.6 2 0.8 4.4 A nswering real user problem, but only if automated K ids App 1.6 1.2 0.4 3.2 Focus on location tracking and need to utilize device besides smartphones, for instance Smartwatch M yP et 1.6 0.8 0.6 3.0 Highly dependent on the reliability and price of the health monitoring device C loud Gam ing 1.2 1.2 0.6 3.0 The games library should extend beyond Tencent games, with the main appeal being PC and console games.
